metadata.title: CVE-2020-35521 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libtiff. Due to a memory allocation failure intif_read.c, a crafted TIFF file can lead to an abort, resulting in denialof service.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
